mapper.insert: INSERT INTO apacheadgentmetadata( `json_version`, hardware_manufactor, hardware_model, hardware_device_id, hardware_location, customer_id, hardware_os, hardware_os_version, firmware_version, host_ip, edgent_agent_name, edgent_agent_version, edgent_agent_app_list, console_url, timestampat ) VALUES (#{json_version}, #{hardware_manufactor}, #{hardware_model}, #{hardware_device_id}, #{hardware_location}, #{customer_id}, #{hardware_os}, #{hardware_os_version}, #{firmware_version}, #{host_ip}, #{edgent_agent_name}, #{edgent_agent_version}, #{edgent_agent_app_list}, #{console_url}, #{timestampat} )
mapper.select:
SELECT id, `json_version`, hardware_manufactor, hardware_model, hardware_device_id, hardware_location, customer_id, hardware_os, hardware_os_version, firmware_version, host_ip, edgent_agent_name, edgent_agent_version, edgent_agent_app_list, console_url, timestampat
FROM apacheadgentmetadata t

SELECT id, `json_version`, hardware_manufactor, hardware_model, hardware_device_id, hardware_location, customer_id, hardware_os, hardware_os_version, firmware_version, host_ip, edgent_agent_name, edgent_agent_version, edgent_agent_app_list, console_url, timestampat
FROM apacheadgentmetadata t
WHERE 1 = 1
AND hardware_manufactor = #{hardware_manufactor} AND hardware_device_id = #{hardware_device_id}

SELECT id, `json_version`, hardware_manufactor, hardware_model, hardware_device_id, hardware_location, customer_id, hardware_os, hardware_os_version, firmware_version, host_ip, edgent_agent_name, edgent_agent_version, edgent_agent_app_list, console_url, timestampat
FROM apacheadgentmetadata t
WHERE 1 = 1
AND hardware_device_id = #{hardware_device_id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE apacheadgentmetadata
json_version = #{json_version},
hardware_manufactor = #{hardware_manufactor},
hardware_model = #{hardware_model},
hardware_device_id = #{hardware_device_id},
hardware_location = #{hardware_location},
customer_id = #{customer_id},
hardware_os = #{hardware_os},
hardware_os_version = #{hardware_os_version},
firmware_version = #{firmware_version},
host_ip = #{host_ip},
edgent_agent_name = #{edgent_agent_name},
edgent_agent_version = #{edgent_agent_version},
edgent_agent_app_list = #{edgent_agent_app_list},
console_url = #{console_url },
timestampat = #{timestampat},
WHERE id = #{id}
